pitches.description: Just over a year old, Haryana-based Hammer founded by Rohit Nandwani has streamlined its product range keeping with the shift to wireless audio tech. It is now focused on strengthening its D2C game.
pitches.title: Hammer

pitches.description: 'Auli Lifestyle' has been conceptualised and created by the effervescent Aishwarya Biswas. Her passion for wellness essentials
pitches.title: auli Lifestyle
